output_list.reason: The function setPromo is only accessible to the contract owner. However, it does not check if the caller is the owner before updating the promoValue. This could allow any address to set the promoValue, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

The function mintTokens is only accessible to the contract owner. However, it does not check if the caller is the owner before minting tokens. This could allow any address to mint tokens, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.
